full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO TSOGS MCHOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES DPAL YE SHES KYIS MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I TSOGS KYIS MCHOD PA MYUR MDZAD DGYES PA'I 'DZUM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RGYUD STOD NAS RGYAL THANG RAB 'BYAMS BLO BZANG THUGS RJES 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, ,BLA MA MGON PO'I RNAL 'BYOR SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NYE 'KHOR BA GSOL DPON BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GO ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
